thread.title: Four Seasons Hotel Houston to Host James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour Dinner Saturday, November 21, 2015
thread.title_full: Four Seasons Hotel Houston to Host James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour Dinner Saturday, November 21, 2015 | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Four Seasons Hotel Houston to Host James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour Dinner Saturday, November 21, 2015
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Houston to Host James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour Dinner Saturday, November 21, 2015
On Saturday, November 21, 2015, Four Seasons Hotel Houston will play proud host to Houston’s hottest culinary event: the James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour Dinner. This special event, which will take place at Quattro Restaurant, will feature a memorable beverage-pairing dinner from Houston’s top chefs, including Quattro’s very own Executive Chef Maurizio Ferrarese.
The James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour brings the unique experience of dining at New York City’s renowned James Beard House to cities around the country. At each dinner, the nation’s finest chefs create unforgettable meals that are works of artistry, craftsmanship and, above all, pure deliciousness.
Houstonians who appreciate great food and wine won’t want to miss this rare opportunity to dine with Houston’s best chefs – all at once! The roster for Houston’s Houston James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour Dinner is as follows:
Appetizers
Robert Del Grande, a James Beard Award winner, Bar Annie & RDG Maurizio Ferrarese, Quattro Restaurant Main Courses
Manabu Horiuchi, Kata Robata Hugo Ortega, Hugo’s Restaurant, Backstreet Café & Caracol Dessert
Marie LeNôtre, Culinary Institute LeNôtre Dinner attendees will also be treated to a celebrity chef photo booth, an exclusive after party in the Lobby Lounge with live piano music, and first rate raffle items including one-of-a-kind Four Seasons getaways and meals at Houston’s most noteworthy restaurants. Houston’s James Beard Celebrity Chef Tour Dinner 2015 promises to be a meal – and evening – for the ages.
Source:-Four Seasons Hotel
